div.div: Ethics approval and consent to participate
div.p: This study was approved by the Institutional Review Board (IRB) of the National Health Insurance Medical Center, Goyang, South Korea (IRB No.: NHIMC 2017â€“12-020). All methods were performed in accordance with the relevant guidelines and regulations. NEDIS provided the data after encryption to protect private information. Therefore, the need for informed consent was waived.
